en.title: Northern Region Celebration Event At Eden Seafood Village Restaurant, Penang, 10 May 2008
en.content:
FE’s Northern Region Celebration Event at Eden Seafood Village Restaurant, Penang on 10th May 2008 was packed with a capacity crowd of 730 Members, Leaders, VIP’s and invited guests. The highlights of the event include :- 

 - Cultural Show by Eden Seafood Village performers
 - Opening message by KS Lee (FE International Marketing Director & Founder)
 - Scalar Energy & QP presentation by Dr. Amir Farid
 - Testimonial by Foo Kok Keong (International Badminton Champion), Jean Daniels 
   (International Long Drive Golf Specialist), Bathi Allimuthu (World Kick Boxing Champion),
    Rachel Thomas (FE Presidential Director), Kenny Yeoh (FE Presidential Director)
 - Demonstrations of QP by KC Phoon (FE Presidential Director)
 - Recognition of new Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Director
 - Closing message by KC Phoon
 - Lucky Draws

- Lucky Draws
